charges.charge_description: 18:641 THEFT OF U. S. PROPERTY-Did willfully and wrongfully steal and purloin goods and property of the United States. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant found guilty after plea of not guilty. Ordered that defendant shall pay a special assessment of $25.00 as to Count 1 due immediately (paid 11/10/93 Receipt No. 58276); Defendant placed on one year unsupervised probation. Defendant to pay fine of $250.00 as to Count 1, which fine plus any interest required shall be paid in full not later than 1/14/94. If notice of appeal filed, Clerk shall transmit PSI under seal to Court of Appeals. (1)
